newsitem.title: USA: Marinex acquires Texas Equipment Co. [CORRECTED 17:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Marinex acquires Texas Equipment Co. [CORRECTED 17:50 GMT]

text.p: Marinex Multimedia Corp, a developer of content for the Internet and CD-ROMs, said on Tuesday that it acquired farm equipment retailer Texas Equipment Co Inc for 16.85 million shares of stock.
Marinex Multimedia has 25 million shares outstanding, it said.

"A solid, well-established, low-tech company with great growth potential is an excellent anchor for a pioneering high-tech, Internet-based content provider," Marinex president Charles (corrects from Stuart) Platkin said in a statement.
Marinex said Texas Equipment had assets of $8.5 million, more than $3 million of shareholder equity and annual revenue of $25 million.
Marinex shares were trading recently at 2-7/8.
